<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armbuildattrs/#aea10ca6bf098a425d51ac7fe65d30ed6aa10cda45fcbf7c8c9804e4e4d2e1bcdf">Symbol</a> &#42;ToSymbol = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UnsignedRI.r&#95;extern) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ToSymbolOrErr = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/macholinkgraphbuilder/#a7a5ae0e2b04f4857cd1af9eabdfb1521">findSymbolByIndex</a>(UnsignedRI.r&#95;symbolnum))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ctx-&gt;notifyFailed(std::move(Err));</span></CodeLine>
